verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2564"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, \w a|strong="G2564"\w* \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G5100"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Italian|strong="G2483"\w* band;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*, beholding \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w being|strong="G1510"\w* seized \w with|strong="G2316"\w* fear, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Thy \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thy \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w ascended|strong="G0305"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w memorial|strong="G3422"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sight|strong="G1715"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Joppe, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* hither \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* surnamed \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*:

\w He|strong="G3739"\w* lodgeth \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w tanner|strong="G1038"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w side|strong="G3844"\w*. \w He|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* tell thee \w what|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w must|strong="G1510"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G5455"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w household|strong="G3610"\w* servants, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* feared \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Lord, \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* under \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w related|strong="G1834"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Joppe.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \w day|strong="G1887"\w*, whilst \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w going|strong="G0305"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* journey, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drawing|strong="G1448"\w* nigh \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* higher parts \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* house \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*, \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w hungry|strong="G4361"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* desirous \w to|strong="G2309"\w* \w taste|strong="G1089"\w* somewhat. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1096"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* preparing, \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* ecstasy \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w mind|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w descending|strong="G2597"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* linen \w sheet|strong="G3607"\w* \w let|strong="G2524"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w corners|strong="G0746"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*:

Wherein \w were|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* manner \w of|strong="G1093"\w* fourfooted beasts, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* creeping \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G1093"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fowls \w of|strong="G1093"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w air|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1096"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Arise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*; \w kill|strong="G2380"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Far|strong="G3588"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* did \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w thing|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* spoke \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w time|strong="G1208"\w*: \w That|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w cleansed|strong="G2511"\w*, \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* thou call common.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w done|strong="G1096"\w* thrice; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* presently \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w*, whilst \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* doubting \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* should \w mean|strong="G1510"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, inquiring \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w Simonâ€™s|strong="G4613"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2186"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gate|strong="G4440"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G0846"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G4074"\w* \w thinking|strong="G1760"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w* three \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* thee.

\w Arise|strong="G0450"\w*, therefore, \w get|strong="G0450"\w* thee \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w doubting|strong="G1252"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w going|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G2597"\w*?

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, \w a|strong="G0191"\w* \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w*, \w a|strong="G0191"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* feareth \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w having|strong="G3140"\w* \w good|strong="G3140"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w received|strong="G3140"\w* \w an|strong="G0032"\w* answer \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w an|strong="G0032"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w send|strong="G3343"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* thee \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* thee.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* bringing \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* lodged \w them|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G1887"\w* \w following|strong="G1887"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* Joppe \w accompanied|strong="G4905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* morrow \w after|strong="G1161"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w waited|strong="G4328"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, having \w called|strong="G4779"\w* \w together|strong="G4779"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* kinsmen \w and|strong="G2532"\w* special \w friends|strong="G5384"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G4074"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w meet|strong="G4876"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w meet|strong="G4876"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w falling|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* adored.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* lifted \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Arise|strong="G1453"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* talking \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G0846"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w together|strong="G4905"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2316"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w how|strong="G5613"\w* \w abominable|strong="G0111"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w keep|strong="G3367"\w* company \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* unto \w one|strong="G3367"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w* nation: \w but|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath shewed \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w call|strong="G3004"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w*.

\w For|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* cause, making no doubt, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G3343"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ask|strong="G4441"\w*, \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* cause \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G3343"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*: \w Four|strong="G5067"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w ago|strong="G0575"\w*, unto \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ninth \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* white \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*:
